XMath.description: Mathematical operation node supporting addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, power, and modulo operations with dual output format.

input_a.name: Input A
input_a.tooltip: input value A (accepts both INT and FLOAT, takes priority when use_input_a is enabled)

input_b.name: Input B
input_b.tooltip: input value B (accepts both INT and FLOAT, takes priority when use_input_b is enabled)

use_input_a.name: Use Input A
use_input_a.tooltip: use input value A (input_a takes precedence when enabled, fallbacks to basic_a if not connected to other node)

use_input_b.name: Use Input B
use_input_b.tooltip: use input value B (input_b takes precedence when enabled, fallbacks to basic_b if not connected to other node)

0.name: int_result
0.tooltip: Integer result (truncated decimal part towards zero)

XResolution.description: Resolution setting node with standard presets and custom scaling.

0.name: width
0.tooltip: Output resolution width (after preset, scaling, and swap)

1.name: height
1.tooltip: Output resolution height (after preset, scaling, and swap)

XImageSave.description: Advanced image saving node with custom filename, subfolder support, and datetime placeholders.

images.name: Images
images.tooltip: Input image tensor (B, H, W, C)

subfolder.name: Subfolder
subfolder.tooltip: Subfolder name (no path separators allowed), supports datetime placeholders: %Y%, %m%, %d%, %H%, %M%, %S%

1.name: save_path
1.tooltip: Saved file path relative to ComfyUI output directory

XLatentLoad.description: Latent loading node supporting both input port and file loading with automatic format detection.

latent_input.name: Latent
latent_input.tooltip: Input latent from another node (higher priority than file loading)

latent_file.name: Latent File
latent_file.tooltip: Latent file to load from ComfyUI output directory

0.name: Latent
0.tooltip: Loaded latent tensor (from input port or file)

XLatentSave.description: Latent saving node with metadata support and custom filename.

subfolder.name: Subfolder
subfolder.tooltip: Subfolder name (no path separators allowed), supports datetime placeholders: %Y%, %m%, %d%, %H%, %M%, %S%

1.name: save_path
1.tooltip: Saved file path relative to ComfyUI output directory

XVideoSave.description: Video saving node with H.265 encoding support and custom parameters.

subfolder.name: Subfolder
subfolder.tooltip: Subfolder name (no path separators allowed), supports datetime placeholders: %Y%, %m%, %d%, %H%, %M%, %S%

crf.name: Video CRF
crf.tooltip: Quality parameter (0=lossless, 40=worst quality). Higher CRF means lower quality with smaller file size.

preset.name: Encoding Preset
preset.tooltip: Encoding speed/compression tradeoff. Faster presets encode quickly but with larger files. Slower presets provide better compression but take longer.

XAudioSave.description: Audio saving node with WAV lossless format, supporting custom filename, subfolder, datetime placeholders, dynamic range compression, loudness normalization, and peak limiting.

subfolder.name: Subfolder
subfolder.tooltip: Subfolder name (no path separators allowed), supports datetime placeholders: %Y%, %m%, %d%, %H%, %M%, %S%

sample_rate.name: Sample Rate
sample_rate.tooltip: Target sample rate for the output audio file

target_lufs.name: Target LUFS
target_lufs.tooltip: Target LUFS value for loudness normalization. Lower values make audio quieter. Default -14.1, Set to -70 to disable.

enable_peak_limiter.name: Enable Peak Limiter
enable_peak_limiter.tooltip: Enable True Peak limiting (broadcast standard, 8x oversampling). When disabled, skips peak limiting.

peak_limit.name: Peak Limit
peak_limit.tooltip: Peak limiting value in dB. Only used when enable_peak_limiter is enabled. Default -1.1, Values below 0 dB prevent clipping.

enable_compression.name: Enable Compression
enable_compression.tooltip: Enable dynamic range compression using acompressor filter. When disabled, skips compression and proceeds directly to LUFS normalization.

compression_mode.name: Compression Mode
compression_mode.tooltip: Compression preset mode. Threshold is automatically calculated based on audio LUFS and target LUFS. Fast: Fast response for voice/podcasts, ratio=3:1. Balanced: Balanced for general use, ratio=2:1. Slow: Smooth for mastering/broadcast, ratio=1.5:1.

use_custom_ratio.name: Use Custom Ratio
use_custom_ratio.tooltip: Enable custom compression ratio to override preset value. When disabled, uses the preset's default ratio.

custom_ratio.name: Custom Ratio
custom_ratio.tooltip: Custom compression ratio (1.0 to 20.0). Only used when use_custom_ratio is enabled. Lower values = lighter compression, higher values = stronger compression. Set ratio to 1.0 to disable compression (pass-through mode).

0.name: Processed_AUDIO
0.tooltip: Audio after resampling, compression, loudness normalization, and peak limiting

1.name: save_path
1.tooltip: Saved file path relative to ComfyUI output directory

XStringGroup.description: Groups 5 multiline string inputs with customizable separation methods between them.

separation_method_1_2.name: Separation method 1-2
separation_method_1_2.tooltip: Separation method between String 1 and String 2

separation_method_2_3.name: Separation method 2-3
separation_method_2_3.tooltip: Separation method between String 2 and String 3

separation_method_3_4.name: Separation method 3-4
separation_method_3_4.tooltip: Separation method between String 3 and String 4

separation_method_4_5.name: Separation method 4-5
separation_method_4_5.tooltip: Separation method between String 4 and String 5

0.name: All Strings
0.tooltip: Output of all grouped strings (with separation methods)

1.name: Selected String
1.tooltip: Selected string output based on select_string

XWorkflowSave.description: Workflow save node that saves the ComfyUI workflow as a JSON file with support for custom filename, subfolder, and datetime placeholders.

anything.name: Any Input
anything.tooltip: Any input type for workflow connection. This input is not processed, only used to link the node into your workflow. (Optional - works without any input)

subfolder.name: Subfolder
subfolder.tooltip: Subfolder name (no path separators allowed), supports datetime placeholders: %Y%, %m%, %d%, %H%, %M%, %S%

0.name: Any Output
0.tooltip: Pass through the input data to downstream nodes

XDateTimeString.description: DateTime string node that generates formatted datetime strings with placeholders for use with nodes that don't natively support date identifiers.
